text: the mother of michael jackson said in court papers she was kept from communicating with outsiders while at a resort in tucson and was unaware she had been reported missing . katherine jackson declared in the documents obtained thursday that she had no idea she was the subject of a search until she accidentally heard a television report . she said she was told her doctor had ordered her to rest and she was flown to arizona . at a spa , her cell phone was confiscated along with her ipad and she said she was kept in a room with no working phone or tv service . cut off : katherine . jackson , pictured in november , said she was planning to travel advised to fly instead , and ended up in arizona . she said she asked about michael 's children and was told they were fine . according to documents obtained by radaronline , mrs jackson said she was planning to travel by motorhome to . see her sons perform in new mexico on july 14 when she was advised by a . doctor she should fly instead . radar reports mrs jackson recalled the . doctor arrived to her door ` stating he had been in contact with my . longtime personal physician and was coming to check on me because my . personal physician was unavailable . ' she continued : ` the doctor advised . that it was better for me to fly and not drive to new mexico . believing . that the doctor was sent at the request of my longtime personal . physician , i followed what i understood to be a doctor 's orders and . boarded a flight as opposed to driving in the motorhome . ' getting . her grandchildren back : mrs jackson is set to become a . co-guardian of blanket , far left , paris , second from left , and prince , centre , after recently having her sole . guardianship temporarily rescinded . instead , . she was flown to miraval spa in tucson . however , the matriarch did not . specify who accompanied her there nor did she say who sent the doctor to . her home . sharing the load : tj jackson will share guardianship of his young cousins with his grandmother . the disclosure marked the latest . development in a series of events that began when katherine jackson was . reported missing last month but later turned up at the spa with family . members . the documents were released after a . judge reinstated katherine jackson as the guardian of the children in an . arrangement that also keeps their cousin as temporary co-guardian . superior court judge mitchell beckloff . said during a hearing that an investigator who looked into the . children 's care found that the late pop star 's 82-year-old mother was an . excellent guardian and the children love her very much . ' i think the kids are in terrific . hands , ' the judge said . ` it appears from the report that katherine . jackson has done a wonderful job and cares about the children very . much . ' beckloff noted that the children , . prince , 15 , paris , 14 and blanket , 10 , also have a close relationship . with their 34-year-old cousin tj jackson , who was named temporary . guardian last week after working closely with katherine jackson since . michael jackson died . tj is ` incredibly respectful ' of the family matriarch and she is respectful of him , the judge said . beckloff said he will finalize the . arrangement later in the month but for now will issue letters of . co-guardianship allowing both jacksons to make decisions about the . children 's welfare . tj jackson 's new co-guardianship . status is temporary , but the judge could make it permanent when he . convenes the next court hearing on august 22 . the shared guardianship plan is . apparently designed to remove pressure from katherine jackson who was . previously named in her son 's will as the children 's sole guardian . on the contrary : mrs jackson was surrounded last month by janet , . jermaine , rebbie and rebbie 's daughter - along with a manager . for the resort where was staying - to quell rumours she was held . against her will . emotional : mrs jackson read a statement claiming she was ` devastated ' to lose custody and said she had been on a ` short vacation ' , contrary to her deposition . perry sanders jr , her lawyer , has said . the arrangement will allow his client to focus on the children 's . upbringing and not on home or logistics issues . beckloff said then that he did n't . believe jackson had done anything wrong but suspended her guardianship . duties because she had been out of contact with her grandchildren for 10 . days . close : . diana ross was named by michael jackson in his will as a potential guardian of the children . the changes in guardianship come on . the heels of family dissension over michael jackson 's will , which left . nothing to his siblings when he died three years ago . several of them . signed a letter that was leaked to the media alleging the will was a . fake and calling on executors of the estate to resign . the . dispute at one point led to a driveway confrontation involving several . family members at the calabasas mansion where katherine jackson and the . children have been living . on wednesday , jermaine jackson issued a plea for peace in the family and withdrew his support of the letter . ` mistakes have been made and . irrational things have been said on both sides in a highly charged . emotional environment , ' jermaine jackson wrote . ` it is time for us all . to draw a line in the sand and move toward peace , co-operation , love and . healing . ' he wrote that the family is still raw . from michael jackson 's death , and his mother has endured incredible . stress and pressures since then . next steps : lawyers acting on behalf of the jackson family and estate spoke about the latest hearing in los angeles today . another party to the jackson family . drama , singer diana ross , who was named by michael jackson in his will . as a potential guardian of the children if katherine jackson was not . available , issued a statement saying the recent turmoil is a private . matter and should n't be playing out publicly . legend : michael jackson , pictured in may 2005 , left a reported $ 1billion legacy to his children . ross and jackson were longtime friends before his death in 2009 . ross , who lives on the east coast , . came to california to visit with the jackson family on wednesday , . katherine jackson 's lawyer said , adding the singer supports the . co-guardianship arrangement . she has been given notice of court . proceedings , but the new agreement apparently will relieve her of any . possible guardianship duties , specifying that katherine and tj jackson . could replace each other if one or the other became unavailable to . serve . mr sanders told radaronline : ` ms ross . met with katherine , and the children yesterday . it was a very thoughtful . and pleasant meeting . ms. ross had no issues with signing off on the . proposed new custody agreement . ' meanwhile , mrs jackson 's declaration . directly contradicts statements she made in an abc news interview , in . which she said she voluntarily cut off communication with the outside . world . with her children jermaine , rebbie , . and janet - and the marketing manager of the resort where she was . staying - the matriarch tried to explain : ` one reason i did n't call is i . just gave up my phone and i did n't want to have any phone calls while i . was here . '
summary: declared in court documents to regain guardianship she was scheduled to take a road trip on july 14 but a doctor advised she fly instead .   landed in tucson and arrived at resort where her mobile devices were taken away .   returned to los angeles 11 days later , after a relative reported her missing .   discovered reports when her television audio was switched on after days without communication .   temporary guardianship awarded to nephew tj jackson during her absence .   arrangement to be finalised later this month for permanent co-guardianship .   judge declared price , paris and blanket are in ` terrific hands ' today , saying katherine has done a ` wonderful job '
